statements: SELECT * FROM driver_performance_metrics;
SELECT driver_id, driving_speed FROM driver_performance_metrics;
SELECT driver_id, fuel_efficiency FROM driver_performance_metrics WHERE driving_speed > 60;
SELECT MAX(driving_speed) FROM driver_performance_metrics;
SELECT AVG(fuel_efficiency) AS avg_fuel_efficiency FROM driver_performance_metrics;
SELECT driver_id, driving_speed, fuel_efficiency FROM driver_performance_metrics WHERE driving_speed > 60 ORDER BY driving_speed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM driver_performance_metrics WHERE fuel_efficiency < 30 ORDER BY driver_id ASC;
SELECT driver_id, AVG(driving_speed) AS avg_speed FROM driver_performance_metrics GROUP BY driver_id HAVING avg_speed > 50 ORDER BY avg_speed DESC;
SELECT driver_id, fuel_efficiency FROM driver_performance_metrics WHERE driver_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND driving_speed BETWEEN 50 AND 70 ORDER BY driver_id;
SELECT MAX(fuel_efficiency) AS max_efficiency FROM driver_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM speed_metrics;
SELECT driver_id, speed, timestamp FROM speed_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT driver_id, speed FROM speed_metrics WHERE speed > 100;
SELECT driver_id, timestamp FROM fuel_metrics ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM speed_metrics WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM speed_metrics WHERE driver_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT driver_id, timestamp, speed FROM speed_metrics WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY speed ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT driver_id, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM speed_metrics GROUP BY driver_id HAVING AVG(speed) > 80 ORDER BY avg_speed DESC;
SELECT driver_id, SUM(fuel_efficiency) AS total_fuel FROM fuel_metrics GROUP BY driver_id ORDER BY total_fuel DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT driver_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM speed_metrics WHERE speed BETWEEN 50 AND 70 GROUP BY driver_id ORDER BY num_records ASC;
SELECT * FROM Drivers;
SELECT driver_name, driving_speed FROM Drivers WHERE driving_speed > 50;
SELECT trip_id, trip_date, distance_traveled FROM Trips ORDER BY distance_traveled DESC;
SELECT driver_name, trip_date, end_location FROM Drivers JOIN Trips ON Drivers.driver_id = Trips.driver_id;
SELECT trip_id, driving_speed, fuel_efficiency FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE driving_speed < 60 AND fuel_efficiency > 25;
SELECT * FROM Drivers WHERE driver_id = 1 AND driver_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT trip_id, trip_date, distance_traveled FROM Trips WHERE distance_traveled > 100 ORDER BY distance_traveled DESC;
SELECT driver_id, AVG(driving_speed) AS avg_speed FROM Trips GROUP BY driver_id ORDER BY avg_speed DESC;

SELECT p.trip_id, p.penalty_points, t.distance_traveled FROM PerformanceMetrics p INNER JOIN Trips t ON p.trip_id = t.trip_id WHERE p.penalty_points > 5 AND t.distance_traveled > 50 ORDER BY p.penalty_points DESC, t.distance_traveled ASC;
SELECT driver_name, SUM(fuel_efficiency) AS total_efficiency FROM Drivers GROUP BY driver_name HAVING total_efficiency > 20 ORDER BY total_efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, driving_speed FROM drivers ORDER BY driving_speed DESC;
SELECT driver_name, SUM(fuel_efficiency) AS total_fuel_efficiency FROM drivers GROUP BY driver_name;
SELECT * FROM trips WHERE trip_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT driver_name, speed FROM drivers JOIN speeding_events ON drivers.driver_id = speeding_events.driver_id ORDER BY event_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, driving_speed FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT driver_name, fuel_efficiency FROM drivers WHERE driving_speed > 60;
SELECT trip_id, trip_date, distance_traveled FROM trips WHERE distance_traveled > 100 ORDER BY trip_date ASC;
SELECT driver_name, event_time, speed FROM speeding_events ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT name, age FROM drivers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT trip_id, distance FROM trips WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT driver_id, model FROM vehicle WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT max_speed, average_speed FROM speed_metrics;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, license_number FROM drivers ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT AVG(distance) AS avg_distance, MAX(duration) AS max_duration FROM trips GROUP BY driver_id
SELECT t.trip_date, d.name, v.model FROM trips t JOIN drivers d ON t.driver_id = d.driver_id JOIN vehicle v ON d.driver_id = v.driver_id WHERE t.distance > 100 ORDER BY t.trip_date DESC
SELECT d.name, COUNT(t.trip_id) AS total_trips FROM drivers d LEFT JOIN trips t ON d.driver_id = t.driver_id GROUP BY d.name HAVING total_trips > 5
